import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AuthService} from "../../Services/auth.service"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-header-user', templateUrl: './header-user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header-user.component.css'] }) export class HeaderUserComponent { user = { username: this.auth.username }; constructor(private auth : AuthService,private router : Router) { } logout() { this.auth.logout(); this.router.navigateByUrl("/login"); } }
